'''Dreams of Healing''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Bathhouse Manjuu]] with [[Yumemizuki Mizuki]]. The [[recipe]] for Bathhouse Manjuu can be purchased from [[Shimura Kanbei]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

Dreams of Healing restores '''130''' stamina with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
